harvestable.comment1: planets will be spawned with a certain inventory size between values in 'inventory_size'
harvestable.comment2: the content of each inventory slot will be choosen randomly from the pondered list
harvestable.comment3: the planet will choose a 'harvestable rate' between min and max base rate.
harvestable.comment4: this is the chance that a certain inventory item will be released when the planet is shot with a weapon
harvestable.comment5: defense_chance is the chance that the planet will spawn enemies when shot
harvestable.comment6: if defense is found to be true, when the planet is shot it will spawn a random defense between values in 'defense_size'
harvestable.comment7: the enemies will be choosen from the pondered list

description.text: Planets are a rich source of base materials for feeding the energy converter of the ship.
